for <S%G1063><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> fleshly. <S%G4559><s%> For <S%G3699><s%> insofar <S%G3699><s%> as there is jealousy, <S%G2205><s%> <S%G2532><s%> strife, <S%G2054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> factions <S%G1370><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> aren't <S%G3780><s%> you <S%G2075><s%> fleshly, <S%G4559><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G4043><s%> you walk in the ways <S%G2596><s%> of men? <S%G444><s%>

each man <S%G1538><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%> will be revealed. <S%G5318><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the Day <S%G2250><s%> will declare it, <S%G1213><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> it is revealed <S%G601><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> fire; <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the fire <S%G4442><s%> itself will test <S%G1381><s%> what sort <S%G3697><s%> of work <S%G2041><s%> each man <S%G1538><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%> is. <S%G2076><s%>

Let <S%G1818><s%> no one <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G1818><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> thinks <S%G1380><s%> that he is <S%G1511><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> let him become <S%G1096><s%> a fool, <S%G3474><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may become <S%G1096><s%> wise. <S%G4680><s%>
